title: God's Choice - A Journey Through High-risk Pregnancy, Premature Birth, and One Child's Fight to Live
description: They said he would never make it. They said no one would question our decision since the pregnancy was less than 24 weeks. They said if our boy lived he would be severely handicapped. Each day they filed into our small hospital room with their forecast of doom. They told us termination was the logical choice. They said it was our "choice." We told them no, that our son's destiny was God's "choice." And God chose Jacob.
author: Katherine Comerford
